title: BETTER THAN RENT! FIRST TIME HOME BUYER CAN BUY WITH $3000-$4000 DOWN!
posting_body: ['STOP WONDERING AROUND AND THE OPPORTUNITY IS HERE!!!', 'First time home buyer can purchase this house with as little as $3000-$4000 down.', ' How much would the first month rent, last month rent plus security deposit will cost you?', 'There are several great programs allow first time home buyer to purchase their first home with a very low down payment.', 'Using the MyHome Assistance & ZIP Program from Cal HFA, along with the government of 3% down, is a great way to buy your first home.', 'It is truly a great program to buy your first home with as little as $3000-$4000 down.', 'Call today to find out how to qualify.', 'I specialize in the first time home buyer program.', 'I will walk you through the entire process.', 'I will get you pre-approved and walking you into your dream home.', 'Ask about our down payment program.', 'No one is better with the experience or expertise in helping first time home buyers.', 'FOR EXCEPTIONAL SERVICES, PLEASE CALL', 'show contact info', 'John Khaw', 'Service You Deserve.', 'Realtor You Trust.', 'BRE 01947490', 'Direct', 'show contact info', 'Nationwide Real Estate Executives', '6850 Lincoln Ave Suite 200', 'Buena Park, Ca 90620', '{Specializing in Orange County, Los Angeles County, Riverside County, San Bernardino County}', 'Picture shown is for illustration purpose only.', 'Actual home meets first time home buyer program.']
